oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peabody at McLean - Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: apartments; architecture; buildings; McLean Boulevard; Peabody Avenue; zoning;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from property owner O.E. Bass to the Board of Adjustment. It is written on the letterhead of the architect, William C. Lester. Mr. Bass is requesting a variance to build a 5-store apartment building on the northwest corner of Peabody and McLean.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bass, O. E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Josh Whitehead (Secretary, Board of Adjustment)
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Memphis and Shelby County Board of Adjustment
